entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
